```{r}
ruta <- "C:/Users/diego/Documents/IECS/Ej_PositCC/prueba_posit/"

library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(rsconnect)

datos <- read_excel("ejemplo.xlsx") %>% mutate(V4 = as.character(Sys.time()))
save(datos, file = paste0(ruta, "datos.RData"))

archivos_www <- list.files(ruta, recursive = TRUE) %>% str_subset("^www/")

deployApp(
  appDir = ruta,
  appFiles = c(
    "app.R",
    "datos.RData",
    archivos_www
  ),
  appName = "iecs_pruebaposit",
  account = "diego",
  upload = TRUE,
  forceUpdate = TRUE,
  launch.browser = FALSE
)
```
